DOC.brief_title: DIU-QoL . Quality Life Evaluation Intrauterine Device Users .
DOC.criteria: 1849 year old female . Women visit gynecology primary care physician start contraception IUD/IUS . Women use hormonal contraception form last 3 month . Women problem listen , read write . Women give write consent participate study . Women contraindication use IUDs . Women previous experience IUDs . Women initiate use IUDs purpose contraception .
